snippet: Mali’s government and an alliance of northern rebels agreed on Thursday to cease hostilities to ease tensions during peace negotiations sponsored by the United Nations aimed at ending decades of uprisings.
abstract: Mali government and northern rebel alliance agree to end hostilities and ease tensions for duration of United Nations-sponsored peace negotiations.
lead_paragraph: Mali’s government and an alliance of northern rebels agreed on Thursday to cease hostilities to ease tensions during peace negotiations sponsored by the United Nations aimed at ending decades of uprisings.

headline.main: Mali: Truce Is Arranged to Bolster Talks
headline.print_headline: Mali: Truce Is Arranged to Bolster Talks
